channel.title: Church Orphans on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Church Orphans on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: The In-Between
item.description: We are currently church orphans. I guess that term is preferable to church shoppers, and it feels more emotionally appropriate because we left our church after discovering it was moving in a different direction from us. To be blunt, it felt like it had already left us, and we had just received the news. This post isn’t about our former church. We love our family there and the work they are doing in the name of our Savior in the city and world.
